text: This is a list of prime ministers of Uzbekistan (), from the creation of the office in 1917 to the present day. The current prime minister, Abdulla Aripov, assumed the office on 14 December 2016. ==List== # Image Name Term of office Party 1 Muhammad Dawlat 1756 1785 2 Utkur Sufi Biy 1785 1812 3 Muhammad Hakim Biy 1812 1837 4 Mirza Aziz Biy 1837 1869 5 Muhammad Yakub Biy 1869 1870 6 Muhammad Biy 1870 1899 7 Astan Quli Biy 1899 1910 8 Mirza Nasr Allah Biy 1910 1917 9 Nizam ad-Din Khoja Urganji 1917 1917 10
